General.Name: Yantai Zhenghai Bio-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Yantai Zhenghai Biotechnology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and marketing of regenerative medical materials in China. The company offers oral cavity repair membrane, absorbable dural (spinal) patch biological membrane patch, and bone repair material products under the Heal-All brand. It also provides skin repair film and self-etching adhesive products under the Heal-Full brand name, as well as surgical caulking sponge products under the Heal Bleed brand. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Yantai, China.
